        <span aria-hidden="true"><!---->I am a fervent machine learning enthusiast with an endless thirst for the newest technological advancements pursuing B.Tech in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science. In addition to coding, I enjoy working with groups to plan interesting technical events, speeches, and workshops that unite the tech community. For the past seven years, I've had the honor of hosting many (tech and non tech) shows, which has helped me hone my communication abilities and establish relationships with various audiences. I take on challenges because of my unwavering confidence and persistence, always looking for ways to advance and innovate.<!----><br><!---->Currently, I am a part of the Artificial Intelligence team at IEEE SB VIT, Pune, where we are trying to create an innovative project that involves AI and ML. In addition to coding, I enjoy working with groups to plan interesting technical events, speeches, and workshops that unite the tech community. For the past seven years, I've had the honor of hosting many (tech and non tech) shows, which has helped me hone my communication abilities and establish relationships with various audiences. I take on challenges because of my unwavering confidence and persistence, always looking for ways to advance and innovate.
Currently, I am a part of the Artificial Intelligence team at IEEE SB VIT, Pune, where we are trying to create an innovative project that involves AI and ML. I am learning more about machine learning, Natural Language Processing and Data Structure and Algorithms. 
Together, let's connect and investigate the exciting worlds of learning, cooperation, and technology.<!----></span>

          tvm-parent-container">
<!---->        <span dir="ltr"><!---->From a workshop attended by 100+ students to a hackathon organised for students, we are thankful to partner with<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="uHSoMZelKarpMoXPaKUneRvjGHSMsCSIAOAk " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/ieee-student-branch-vit-pune/" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><span><!---->IEEE Student Branch VIT Pune<!----></span></span></a><!---->!<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->With bright minds and innovative ideas, the hackathon was a platform for students to explore how AI is revolutionizing the financial industry‚Äîfrom robo-advisors to fraud detection and beyond.<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->üîë Highlights of the Hackathon:<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Students built AI-driven financial solutions from scratch<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Hands-on mentorship from our team of experts<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Exposure to real-world FinTech challenges<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ A showcase of creative problem-solving and technical brilliance<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->The energy, enthusiasm, and innovation displayed by these young minds were truly inspiring!<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->At<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="uHSoMZelKarpMoXPaKUneRvjGHSMsCSIAOAk " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="http://Uptiq.ai" <!---->        <span dir="ltr"><!---->From a workshop attended by 100+ students to a hackathon organised for students, we are thankful to partner with<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a Student Branch VIT Pune<!----></span></span></a><!---->!<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->With bright minds and innovative ideas, the hackathon was a platform for students to explore how AI is revolutionizing the financial industry‚Äîfrom robo-advisors to fraud detection and beyond.<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->üîë Highlights of the Hackathon:<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Students built AI-driven financial solutions from scratch<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Hands-on mentorship from our team of experts<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Exposure to real-world FinTech challenges<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ A showcase of creative problem-solving and technical brilliance<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->The energy, enthusiasm, and innovation displayed by these young minds were truly inspiring!<span class="white-space-pre"> <!---->        <span dir="ltr"><!---->Thrilled to announce that our team clinched the first prize at the SaaS Hackathon conducted by CSI MIT-WPU Pune! üèÜ<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->We developed an AI-powered organizational agent that automates productivity tools like email, Notion, and Google Calendar, significantly reducing manual efforts in managing tasks and meetings.<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->This achievement would not have been possible without my teammates,<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="bKitxDDAQqpwXZxDSIyHcsuFHqiIdTZqbQ " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAD5T9qwBOELrG728fBOcQpManlMOdgHD3AU" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/nishant-lanjewar-838248252/" id="ember428" class="ember-view"><!---->Nishant Lanjewar<!----></a></span></a><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>and<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="bKitxDDAQqpwXZxDSIyHcsuFHqiIdTZqbQ " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAD-OInABBIYpWA9j8ikBOI5hak1z0TWeD_Q" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/nidhish-wakodikar-b00117259/" id="ember429" class="ember-view"><!---->Nidhish Wakodikar<!----></a></span></a><!---->. Together, we secured a cash prize of ‚Çπ10,000 for our innovative solution.<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->This hybrid hackathon experience, from prototyping to the final offline presentations, was both challenging and rewarding. It's amazing to see our hard work pay off and receive recognition for our idea.<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->Excited to see where this journey takes us next!<!----></span>
      </span>
    </div>

<!---->
      <span class="break-words
          tvm-parent-container">
<!---->        <span dir="ltr"><!---->From a workshop attended by 100+ students to a hackathon organised for students, we are thankful to partner with<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="bKitxDDAQqpwXZxDSIyHcsuFHqiIdTZqbQ " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/ieee-student-branch-vit-pune/" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><span><!---->IEEE Student Branch VIT Pune<!----></span></span></a><!---->!<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->With bright minds and innovative ideas, the hackathon was a platform for students to explore how AI is revolutionizing the financial industry‚Äîfrom robo-advisors to fraud detection and beyond.<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->üîë Highlights of the Hackathon:<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Students built AI-driven financial solutions from scratch<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Hands-on mentorship from our team of experts<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Exposure to real-world FinTech challenges<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ A showcase of creative problem-solving and technical brilliance<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->The energy, enthusiasm, and innovation displayed by these young minds were truly inspiring!<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->At<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="bKitxDDAQqpwXZxDSIyHcsuFHqiIdTZqbQ " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="http://Uptiq.ai"         <span aria-hidden="true"><!---->I am a fervent machine learning enthusiast with an endless thirst for the newest technological advancements pursuing B.Tech in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science. In addition to coding, I enjoy working with groups to plan interesting technical events, speeches, and workshops that unite the tech community. For the past seven years, I've had the honor of hosting many (tech and non tech) shows, which has helped me hone my communication abilities and establish relationships with various audiences. I take on challenges because of my unwavering confidence and persistence, always looking for ways to advance and innovate.<!----><br><!---->Currently, I am a part of the Artificial Intelligence team at IEEE SB VIT, Pune, where we are trying to create an innovative project that involves AI and ML. I am learning more about machine learning, Natural Language Processing and Data Structure and Algorithms.<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><br><!---->Together, let's connect and investigate the exciting worlds of learning, cooperation, and technology.<!----></span><span class="visually-hidden"><!---->I am a fervent machine learning enthusiast with an endless thirst for the newest technological advancements pursuing B.Tech in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science. In addition to coding, I enjoy working with groups to plan interesting technical events, speeches, and workshops that unite the tech community. For the past seven years, I've had the honor of hosting many (tech and non tech) shows, which has helped me hone my communication abilities and establish relationships with various audiences. I take on challenges because of my unwavering confidence and persistence, always looking for ways to advance and innovate.
Currently, I am a part of the Artificial Intelligence team at IEEE SB VIT, Pune, where we are trying to create an innovative project that involves AI and ML. I am learning more about machine learning, Natural Language Processing and Data Structure and Algorithms. 
Together, let's connect and investigate the exciting worlds of learning, cooperation, and technology.<!----></span>

<!---->        <span dir="ltr"><!---->From a workshop attended by 100+ students to a hackathon organised for students, we are thankful to partner with<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a Student Branch VIT Pune<!----></span></span></a><!---->!<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->With bright minds and innovative ideas, the hackathon was a platform for students to explore how AI is revolutionizing the financial industry‚Äîfrom robo-advisors to fraud detection and beyond.<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->üîë Highlights of the Hackathon:<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Students built AI-driven financial solutions from scratch<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Hands-on mentorship from our team of experts<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Exposure to real-world FinTech challenges<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ A showcase of creative problem-solving and technical brilliance<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->The energy, enthusiasm, and innovation displayed by these young minds were truly inspiring!<span class="white-space-pre"> <!---->
      <span class="break-words
          tvm-parent-container">
<!---->        <span dir="ltr"><!---->Thrilled to announce that our team clinched the first prize at the SaaS Hackathon conducted by CSI MIT-WPU Pune! üèÜ<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->We developed an AI-powered organizational agent that automates productivity tools like email, Notion, and Google Calendar, significantly reducing manual efforts in managing tasks and meetings.<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->This achievement would not have been possible without my teammates,<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="bKitxDDAQqpwXZxDSIyHcsuFHqiIdTZqbQ " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAD5T9qwBOELrG728fBOcQpManlMOdgHD3AU" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/nishant-lanjewar-838248252/" id="ember433" class="ember-view"><!---->Nishant Lanjewar<!----></a></span></a><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>and<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="bKitxDDAQqpwXZxDSIyHcsuFHqiIdTZqbQ " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAD-OInABBIYpWA9j8ikBOI5hak1z0TWeD_Q" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/nidhish-wakodikar-b00117259/" id="ember434" class="active ember-view"><!---->Nidhish Wakodikar<!----></a></span></a><!---->. Together, we secured a cash prize of ‚Çπ10,000 for our innovative solution.<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->This hybrid hackathon experience, from prototyping to the final offline presentations, was both challenging and rewarding. It's amazing to see our hard work pay off and receive recognition for our idea.<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->Excited to see where this journey takes us next!<!----></span>
      </span>
    </div>

      <span class="break-words
          tvm-parent-container">
<!---->        <span dir="ltr"><!---->Thrilled to announce that our team clinched the first prize at the SaaS Hackathon conducted by CSI MIT-WPU Pune! üèÜ<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->We developed an AI-powered organizational agent that automates productivity tools like email, Notion, and Google Calendar, significantly reducing manual efforts in managing tasks and meetings.<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->This achievement would not have been possible without my teammates,<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="bKitxDDAQqpwXZxDSIyHcsuFHqiIdTZqbQ " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAD5T9qwBOELrG728fBOcQpManlMOdgHD3AU" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/nishant-lanjewar-838248252/" id="ember464" class="ember-view"><!---->Nishant Lanjewar<!----></a></span></a><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>and<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="bKitxDDAQqpwXZxDSIyHcsuFHqiIdTZqbQ " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAD-OInABBIYpWA9j8ikBOI5hak1z0TWeD_Q" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/nidhish-wakodikar-b00117259/" id="ember465" class="active ember-view"><!---->Nidhish Wakodikar<!----></a></span></a><!---->. Together, we secured a cash prize of ‚Çπ10,000 for our innovative solution.<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->This hybrid hackathon experience, from prototyping to the final offline presentations, was both challenging and rewarding. It's amazing to see our hard work pay off and receive recognition for our idea.<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->Excited to see where this journey takes us next!<!----></span>
      </span>
    </div>

**Formatting Notes:**

* **Font:**  A clean and professional font like Calibri, Arial, or Times New Roman is recommended.  Size 10-12pt for body text, slightly larger for headings.
* **Section Headings:** Bold and slightly larger font size to improve readability.
* **Bullet Points:** Consistent use of bullet points for easy scanning.
* **White Space:** Ample white space is used to avoid a cramped look.  Consider adding a small space between sections.
* **Emphasis:** Use bolding or italics sparingly for important keywords or achievements.
* **Contact Information:**  Keep contact information at the top, easy to find.
* **Length:** Aim for a one-page resume if possible.  Prioritize the most relevant information.


Remember to replace the bracketed information with your own details.  You can adjust the formatting further to match your personal style while maintaining professionalism and readability.  Consider using a resume builder tool or template for additional assistance if needed.

         full-width" style="-webkit-line-clamp:4;" dir="ltr" tabindex="-1">

        <span aria-hidden="true"><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>I am passionate about technology and innovation, currently working as a co-founder and principal developer at Gigayouth Continuum. With extensive experience in full-stack development using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js), I also have proficiency in Python, C, and Java. I have a strong foundation in front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Bootstrap, alongside back-end expertise in Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. I also work with AWS, Docker, and Git for cloud computing and version control.<!----><br><br><!---->Currently pursuing my studies in the IT department at Vishwakarma Institute of Technology, Pune, my recent projects include CounsellorNavigator, a personalized college recommendation system using data analytics and machine learning, and AR Wardrobe, a Smart India Hackathon project aimed at revolutionizing retail experiences through virtual try-ons and personalized fashion insights using AR, machine learning, and 3D modeling.<!----><br><br><!---->I recently had the opportunity to present a research paper titled ‚ÄúAccelerating Results With No Copy-Paste Hassle‚Äù at the 1st International Conference on Applied Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. I‚Äôm always eager to learn, which has led me to explore emerging technologies like Amazon Textract for document processing and Three.js for 3D model integration.<!----><br><br><!---->Beyond my academic and technical interests, I‚Äôve represented VIT in several cricket competitions, winning multiple titles and earning the ‚ÄúMan of the Match‚Äù award in a few matches. I also secured a cash prize in a competition at PCCoER, adding to my diverse achievements. My experiences in competitive sports have strengthened my teamwork, discipline, and perseverance, which I apply to both my personal and professional life.<!----><br><br><!---->I firmly believe in the power of proactive action and innovation. My guiding mantra, ‚ÄúThe best way to predict the future is to invent it,‚Äù reflects my commitment to shaping a future full of possibilities and opportunities.<!----><br><br><!---->Outside of my academic and professional pursuits, I‚Äôm a skilled athlete and have represented my state in multiple sports, with cricket being my primary focus. My dedication to sports demonstrates my disciplined approach to life and my ability to excel both individually and in team settings.<!----><br><br><!---->I‚Äôm also actively involved in leadership and volunteering roles with IEEE and other extracurricular initiatives, always looking to inspire and empower students through technical sessions. If you‚Äôre interested in collaborating on innovative projects or want to discuss tech trends, feel free to connect!<!----><br></span><span class="visually-hidden"><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>I am passionate about technology and innovation, currently working as a co-founder and principal developer at Gigayouth Continuum. With extensive experience in full-stack development using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js), I also have proficiency in Python, C, and Java. I have a strong foundation in front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Bootstrap, alongside back-end expertise in Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. I also work with AWS, Docker, and Git for cloud computing and version control.

Currently pursuing my studies in the IT department at Vishwakarma Institute of Technology, Pune, my recent projects include CounsellorNavigator, a personalized college recommendation system using data analytics and machine learning, and AR Wardrobe, a Smart India Hackathon project aimed at revolutionizing retail experiences through virtual try-ons and personalized fashion insights using AR, machine learning, and 3D modeling.

I recently had the opportunity to present a research paper titled ‚ÄúAccelerating Results With No Copy-Paste Hassle‚Äù at the 1st International Conference on Applied Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. I‚Äôm always eager to learn, which has led me to explore emerging technologies like Amazon Textract for document processing and Three.js for 3D model integration.

Beyond my academic and technical interests, I‚Äôve represented VIT in several cricket competitions, winning multiple titles and earning the ‚ÄúMan of the Match‚Äù award in a few matches. I also secured a cash prize in a competition at PCCoER, adding to my diverse achievements. My experiences in competitive sports have strengthened my teamwork, discipline, and perseverance, which I apply to both my personal and professional life.

I firmly believe in the power of proactive action and innovation. My guiding mantra, ‚ÄúThe best way to predict the future is to invent it,‚Äù reflects my commitment to shaping a future full of possibilities and opportunities.

Outside of my academic and professional pursuits, I‚Äôm a skilled athlete and have represented my state in multiple sports, with cricket being my primary focus. My dedication to sports demonstrates my disciplined approach to life and my ability to excel both individually and in team settings.

I‚Äôm also actively involved in leadership and volunteering roles with IEEE and other extracurricular initiatives, always looking to inspire and empower students through technical sessions. If you‚Äôre interested in collaborating on innovative projects or want to discuss tech trends, feel free to connect!<span class="white-space-pre"> </span></span>

<!---->
      <span class="break-words
          tvm-parent-container">
<!---->        <span dir="ltr"><!---->From a Backbencher to a Speaker ‚Äì A Journey I Never Imagined! üé§üöÄ<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->If you had told me a year ago that I‚Äôd be standing in front of my peers, conducting an expert hands-on session on MongoDB, I probably wouldn‚Äôt have believed you. Being a backbencher, I always thought of myself as someone who learned best by observing. But this experience made me realise that growth happens when you step out of your comfort zone.<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->Recently, I had the privilege of leading a session for Second-Year IT students at VIT Pune, sharing insights on NoSQL databases, schema design, and real-world applications of MongoDB. Teaching my own batchmates, people of my age, was something I never imagined myself doing‚Äîand yet, here I was, guiding them through hands-on learning!<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->üîπ Key Takeaways from this Experience:<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Teaching is the best way to learn ‚Äì Breaking down complex topics made me understand them even better.<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Leadership &amp; communication matter ‚Äì It‚Äôs not just about what you know, but how well you can share it.<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Every step counts ‚Äì From being hesitant to speak up in class to leading a technical session, this journey has been surreal.<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->A huge thanks to<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="HwfnrGwzbVhgqrHJQnWsTubRGppSSZmI " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAABqKuJ8B0y79m0n9oFrH7KPqnhRzg7enWS4" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/amruta-amune-113168105/" id="ember568" class="ember-view"><!---->Amruta Amune<!----></a></span></a><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>ma‚Äôam and<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="HwfnrGwzbVhgqrHJQnWsTubRGppSSZmI " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAEI2rj8BS-U8bElA_J8tOGsWUS03QiVK8Ek" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/pankaj-kunekar-313046270/" id="ember569" class="ember-view"><!---->PANKAJ KUNEKAR<!----></a></span></a><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>sir for believing in me and providing this opportunity. Your support means a lot!<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->This experience has only fueled my passion for tech, mentorship, and continuous learning. Looking forward to more such opportunities and collaborations! If you‚Äôre into databases, full-stack development, or Web3, let‚Äôs connect! üí°<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><a class="HwfnrGwzbVhgqrHJQnWsTubRGppSSZmI " tabindex="0" <!---->        <span dir="ltr"><!---->üèÜ Excited to Announce Our Achievement at the IndoVateAI Sprint 2025 Hackathon! üéâ<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->Thrilled to share that our team was recognised with the Best Outstanding Award at the IndoVateAI Sprint 2025 Hackathon! This 18-hour hackathon, sponsored by IndoAI Technologies and organized by the<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="HwfnrGwzbVhgqrHJQnWsTubRGppSSZmI " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/ieee-cis-ccew-student-branch/" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><span><!---->IEEE CIS CCEW Student Branch<!----></span></span></a><!---->, featured 100+ teams, with only 30 making it past the first elimination round. Competing among such brilliant minds and earning this award has been an incredible journey!<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->Our project, IndoTrade, is an AI-powered stock analysis and trading platform that leverages real-time financial data and machine learning insights to assist users in making informed investment decisions. By integrating stock and crypto analysis with AI-driven recommendations, Monte Carlo simulations, and personalised features, IndoTrade enhances trading strategies and market understanding. üìàü§ñ<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->A massive shoutout to my fantastic teammates<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="HwfnrGwzbVhgqrHJQnWsTubRGppSSZmI " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAESIoH0BG8NkvDwb_nOko5V02NZi9SSGhD4" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/shlokbam/" id="ember594" class="ember-view"><!---->Shlok Bam<!----></a></span></a><!---->,<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="HwfnrGwzbVhgqrHJQnWsTubRGppSSZmI " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAD9o18UBTQSoXGp1VlTG5JNrV4PGlf1xSyk" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/aditya-bhattacharya-software-developer/" id="ember595" class="ember-view"><!---->Aditya Bhattacharya<!----></a></span></a><!---->, and<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="HwfnrGwzbVhgqrHJQnWsTubRGppSSZmI " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAEZNGhkBpGUbSiWd-LFRGumrkHrwsup67uE" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/akshat-patil-909bb828a/" id="ember596" class="ember-view"><!---->Akshat Patil<!----></a></span></a><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>for their dedication and collaboration.           full-width t-14 t-normal t-black display-flex align-items-center" dir="ltr">
        
    <div class="qpLpGFBZPFUQueansOQAwgevGQYpjkZup
        inline-show-more-text--is-collapsed
        inline-show-more-text--is-collapsed-with-line-clamp
        
        
        
         full-width" style="-webkit-line-clamp:4;" dir="ltr" tabindex="-1">

        <span aria-hidden="true"><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>I am passionate about technology and innovation, currently working as a co-founder and principal developer at Gigayouth Continuum. With extensive experience in full-stack development using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js), I also have proficiency in Python, C, and Java. I have a strong foundation in front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Bootstrap, alongside back-end expertise in Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. I also work with AWS, Docker, and Git for cloud computing and version control.<!----><br><br><!---->Currently pursuing my studies in the IT department at Vishwakarma Institute of Technology, Pune, my recent projects include CounsellorNavigator, a personalized college recommendation system using data analytics and machine learning, and AR Wardrobe, a Smart India Hackathon project aimed at revolutionizing retail experiences through virtual try-ons and personalized fashion insights using AR, machine learning, and 3D modeling.<!----><br><br><!---->I recently had the opportunity to present a research paper titled ‚ÄúAccelerating Results With No Copy-Paste Hassle‚Äù at the 1st International Conference on Applied Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. I‚Äôm always eager to learn, which has led me to explore emerging technologies like Amazon Textract for document processing and Three.js for 3D model integration.<!----><br><br><!---->Beyond my academic and technical interests, I‚Äôve represented VIT in several cricket competitions, winning multiple titles and earning the ‚ÄúMan of the Match‚Äù award in a few matches. I also secured a cash prize in a competition at PCCoER, adding to my diverse achievements. My experiences in competitive sports have strengthened my teamwork, discipline, and perseverance, which I apply to both my personal and professional life.<!----><br><br><!---->I firmly believe in the power of proactive action and innovation. My guiding mantra, ‚ÄúThe best way to predict the future is to invent it,‚Äù reflects my commitment to shaping a future full of possibilities and opportunities.<!----><br><br><!---->Outside of my academic and professional pursuits, I‚Äôm a skilled athlete and have represented my state in multiple sports, with cricket being my primary focus. My dedication to sports demonstrates my disciplined approach to life and my ability to excel both individually and in team settings.<!----><br><br><!---->I‚Äôm also actively involved in leadership and volunteering roles with IEEE and other extracurricular initiatives, always looking to inspire and empower students through technical sessions. If you‚Äôre interested in collaborating on innovative projects or want to discuss tech trends, feel free to connect!<!----><br></span><span class="visually-hidden"><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>I am passionate about technology and innovation, currently working as a co-founder and principal developer at Gigayouth Continuum. With extensive experience in full-stack development using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js), I also have proficiency in Python, C, and Java. I have a strong foundation in front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Bootstrap, alongside back-end expertise in Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. I also work with AWS, Docker, and Git for cloud computing and version control.

Currently pursuing my studies in the IT department at Vishwakarma Institute of Technology, Pune, my recent projects include CounsellorNavigator, a personalized college recommendation system using data analytics and machine learning, and AR Wardrobe, a Smart India Hackathon project aimed at revolutionizing retail experiences through virtual try-ons and personalized fashion insights using AR, machine learning, and 3D modeling.

I recently had the opportunity to present a research paper titled ‚ÄúAccelerating Results With No Copy-Paste Hassle‚Äù at the 1st International Conference on Applied Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. I‚Äôm always eager to learn, which has led me to explore emerging technologies like Amazon Textract for document processing and Three.js for 3D model integration.

Beyond my academic and technical interests, I‚Äôve represented VIT in several cricket competitions, winning multiple titles and earning the ‚ÄúMan of the Match‚Äù award in a few matches. I also secured a cash prize in a competition at PCCoER, adding to my diverse achievements. My experiences in competitive sports have strengthened my teamwork, discipline, and perseverance, which I apply to both my personal and professional life.

I firmly believe in the power of proactive action and innovation. My guiding mantra, ‚ÄúThe best way to predict the future is to invent it,‚Äù reflects my commitment to shaping a future full of possibilities and opportunities.

Outside of my academic and professional pursuits, I‚Äôm a skilled athlete and have represented my state in multiple sports, with cricket being my primary focus. My dedication to sports demonstrates my disciplined approach to life and my ability to excel both individually and in team settings.

I‚Äôm also actively involved in leadership and volunteering roles with IEEE and other extracurricular initiatives, always looking to inspire and empower students through technical sessions. If you‚Äôre interested in collaborating on innovative projects or want to discuss tech trends, feel free to connect!<span class="white-space-pre"> </span></span>

          <span class="inline-show-more-text__link-container-collapsed">
<!---->            <button class="inline-show-more-text__button
                inline-show-more-text__button--light
                link" aria-expanded="false" role="button" type="button">
              ‚Ä¶see more
            </button>
          </span>

<!---->    </div>
  
      </div>

<!---->
      <span class="break-words
          tvm-parent-container">
<!---->        <span dir="ltr"><!---->From a Backbencher to a Speaker ‚Äì A Journey I Never Imagined! üé§üöÄ<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->If you had told me a year ago that I‚Äôd be standing in front of my peers, conducting an expert hands-on session on MongoDB, I probably wouldn‚Äôt have believed you. Being a backbencher, I always thought of myself as someone who learned best by observing. But this experience made me realise that growth happens when you step out of your comfort zone.<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->Recently, I had the privilege of leading a session for Second-Year IT students at VIT Pune, sharing insights on NoSQL databases, schema design, and real-world applications of MongoDB. Teaching my own batchmates, people of my age, was something I never imagined myself doing‚Äîand yet, here I was, guiding them through hands-on learning!<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->üîπ Key Takeaways from this Experience:<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Teaching is the best way to learn ‚Äì Breaking down complex topics made me understand them even better.<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Leadership &amp; communication matter ‚Äì It‚Äôs not just about what you know, but how well you can share it.<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Every step counts ‚Äì From being hesitant to speak up in class to leading a technical session, this journey has been surreal.<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->A huge thanks to<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="HwfnrGwzbVhgqrHJQnWsTubRGppSSZmI " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAABqKuJ8B0y79m0n9oFrH7KPqnhRzg7enWS4" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/amruta-amune-113168105/" id="ember568" class="ember-view"><!---->Amruta Amune<!----></a></span></a><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>ma‚Äôam and<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="HwfnrGwzbVhgqrHJQnWsTubRGppSSZmI " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAEI2rj8BS-U8bElA_J8tOGsWUS03QiVK8Ek" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/pankaj-kunekar-313046270/" id="ember569" class="ember-view"><!---->PANKAJ KUNEKAR<!----></a></span></a><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>sir for believing in me and providing this opportunity. Your support means a lot!<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->This experience has only fueled my passion for tech, mentorship, and continuous learning. Looking forward to more such opportunities and collaborations! If you‚Äôre into databases, full-stack development, or Web3, let‚Äôs connect! üí°<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><a class="HwfnrGwzbVhgqrHJQnWsTubRGppSSZmI " tabindex="0" <!---->        <span dir="ltr"><!---->üèÜ Excited to Announce Our Achievement at the IndoVateAI Sprint 2025 Hackathon! üéâ<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->Thrilled to share that our team was recognised with the Best Outstanding Award at the IndoVateAI Sprint 2025 Hackathon! This 18-hour hackathon, sponsored by IndoAI Technologies and organized by the<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="HwfnrGwzbVhgqrHJQnWsTubRGppSSZmI " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/ieee-cis-ccew-student-branch/" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><span><!---->IEEE CIS CCEW Student Branch<!----></span></span></a><!---->, featured 100+ teams, with only 30 making it past the first elimination round. Competing among such brilliant minds and earning this award has been an incredible journey!<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->Our project, IndoTrade, is an AI-powered stock analysis and trading platform that leverages real-time financial data and machine learning insights to assist users in making informed investment decisions. By integrating stock and crypto analysis with AI-driven recommendations, Monte Carlo simulations, and personalised features, IndoTrade enhances trading strategies and market understanding. üìàü§ñ<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->A massive shoutout to my fantastic teammates<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="HwfnrGwzbVhgqrHJQnWsTubRGppSSZmI " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAESIoH0BG8NkvDwb_nOko5V02NZi9SSGhD4" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/shlokbam/" id="ember594" class="ember-view"><!---->Shlok Bam<!----></a></span></a><!---->,<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="HwfnrGwzbVhgqrHJQnWsTubRGppSSZmI " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAD9o18UBTQSoXGp1VlTG5JNrV4PGlf1xSyk" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/aditya-bhattacharya-software-developer/" id="ember595" class="ember-view"><!---->Aditya Bhattacharya<!----></a></span></a><!---->, and<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="HwfnrGwzbVhgqrHJQnWsTubRGppSSZmI " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAEZNGhkBpGUbSiWd-LFRGumrkHrwsup67uE" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/akshat-patil-909bb828a/" id="ember596" class="ember-view"><!---->Akshat Patil<!----></a></span></a><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>for their dedication and collaboration.         <span aria-hidden="true"><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>I am passionate about technology and innovation, currently working as a co-founder and principal developer at Gigayouth Continuum. With extensive experience in full-stack development using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js), I also have proficiency in Python, C, and Java. I have a strong foundation in front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Bootstrap, alongside back-end expertise in Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. I also work with AWS, Docker, and Git for cloud computing and version control.<!----><br><br><!---->Currently pursuing my studies in the IT department at Vishwakarma Institute of Technology, Pune, my recent projects include CounsellorNavigator, a personalized college recommendation system using data analytics and machine learning, and AR Wardrobe, a Smart India Hackathon project aimed at revolutionizing retail experiences through virtual try-ons and personalized fashion insights using AR, machine learning, and 3D modeling.<!----><br><br><!---->I recently had the opportunity to present a research paper titled ‚ÄúAccelerating Results With No Copy-Paste Hassle‚Äù at the 1st International Conference on Applied Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. I‚Äôm always eager to learn, which has led me to explore emerging technologies like Amazon Textract for document processing and Three.js for 3D model integration.<!----><br><br><!---->Beyond my academic and technical interests, I‚Äôve represented VIT in several cricket competitions, winning multiple titles and earning the ‚ÄúMan of the Match‚Äù award in a few matches. I also secured a cash prize in a competition at PCCoER, adding to my diverse achievements. My experiences in competitive sports have strengthened my teamwork, discipline, and perseverance, which I apply to both my personal and professional life.<!----><br><br><!---->I firmly believe in the power of proactive action and innovation. My guiding mantra, ‚ÄúThe best way to predict the future is to invent it,‚Äù reflects my commitment to shaping a future full of possibilities and opportunities.<!----><br><br><!---->Outside of my academic and professional pursuits, I‚Äôm a skilled athlete and have represented my state in multiple sports, with cricket being my primary focus. My dedication to sports demonstrates my disciplined approach to life and my ability to excel both individually and in team settings.<!----><br><br><!---->I‚Äôm also actively involved in leadership and volunteering roles with IEEE and other extracurricular initiatives, always looking to inspire and empower students through technical sessions. If you‚Äôre interested in collaborating on innovative projects or want to discuss tech trends, feel free to connect!<!----><br></span><span class="visually-hidden"><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>I am passionate about technology and innovation, currently working as a co-founder and principal developer at Gigayouth Continuum. With extensive experience in full-stack development using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js), I also have proficiency in Python, C, and Java. I have a strong foundation in front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Bootstrap, alongside back-end expertise in Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. I also work with AWS, Docker, and Git for cloud computing and version control.

Currently pursuing my studies in the IT department at Vishwakarma Institute of Technology, Pune, my recent projects include CounsellorNavigator, a personalized college recommendation system using data analytics and machine learning, and AR Wardrobe, a Smart India Hackathon project aimed at revolutionizing retail experiences through virtual try-ons and personalized fashion insights using AR, machine learning, and 3D modeling.

I recently had the opportunity to present a research paper titled ‚ÄúAccelerating Results With No Copy-Paste Hassle‚Äù at the 1st International Conference on Applied Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. I‚Äôm always eager to learn, which has led me to explore emerging technologies like Amazon Textract for document processing and Three.js for 3D model integration.

Beyond my academic and technical interests, I‚Äôve represented VIT in several cricket competitions, winning multiple titles and earning the ‚ÄúMan of the Match‚Äù award in a few matches. I also secured a cash prize in a competition at PCCoER, adding to my diverse achievements. My experiences in competitive sports have strengthened my teamwork, discipline, and perseverance, which I apply to both my personal and professional life.

I firmly believe in the power of proactive action and innovation. My guiding mantra, ‚ÄúThe best way to predict the future is to invent it,‚Äù reflects my commitment to shaping a future full of possibilities and opportunities.

Outside of my academic and professional pursuits, I‚Äôm a skilled athlete and have represented my state in multiple sports, with cricket being my primary focus. My dedication to sports demonstrates my disciplined approach to life and my ability to excel both individually and in team settings.

I‚Äôm also actively involved in leadership and volunteering roles with IEEE and other extracurricular initiatives, always looking to inspire and empower students through technical sessions. If you‚Äôre interested in collaborating on innovative projects or want to discuss tech trends, feel free to connect!<span class="white-space-pre"> </span></span>

      <span class="break-words
          tvm-parent-container">
<!---->        <span dir="ltr"><!---->From a Backbencher to a Speaker ‚Äì A Journey I Never Imagined! üé§üöÄ<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->If you had told me a year ago that I‚Äôd be standing in front of my peers, conducting an expert hands-on session on MongoDB, I probably wouldn‚Äôt have believed you. Being a backbencher, I always thought of myself as someone who learned best by observing. But this experience made me realise that growth happens when you step out of your comfort zone.<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->Recently, I had the privilege of leading a session for Second-Year IT students at VIT Pune, sharing insights on NoSQL databases, schema design, and real-world applications of MongoDB. Teaching my own batchmates, people of my age, was something I never imagined myself doing‚Äîand yet, here I was, guiding them through hands-on learning!<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->üîπ Key Takeaways from this Experience:<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Teaching is the best way to learn ‚Äì Breaking down complex topics made me understand them even better.<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Leadership &amp; communication matter ‚Äì It‚Äôs not just about what you know, but how well you can share it.<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Every step counts ‚Äì From being hesitant to speak up in class to leading a technical session, this journey has been surreal.<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->A huge thanks to<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAABqKuJ8B0y79m0n9oFrH7KPqnhRzg7enWS4" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/amruta-amune-113168105/" id="ember573" class="ember-view"><!---->Amruta Amune<!----></a></span></a><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>ma‚Äôam and<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAEI2rj8BS-U8bElA_J8tOGsWUS03QiVK8Ek" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/pankaj-kunekar-313046270/" id="ember574" class="ember-view"><!---->PANKAJ KUNEKAR<!----></a></span></a><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>sir for believing in me and providing this opportunity. Your support means a lot!<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->This experience has only fueled my passion for tech, mentorship, and continuous learning. Looking forward to more such opportunities and collaborations! If you‚Äôre into databases, full-stack development, or Web3, let‚Äôs connect! üí°<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " tabindex="0" <!---->        <span dir="ltr"><!---->üèÜ Excited to Announce Our Achievement at the IndoVateAI Sprint 2025 Hackathon! üéâ<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->Thrilled to share that our team was recognised with the Best Outstanding Award at the IndoVateAI Sprint 2025 Hackathon! This 18-hour hackathon, sponsored by IndoAI Technologies and organized by the<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/ieee-cis-ccew-student-branch/" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><span><!---->IEEE CIS CCEW Student Branch<!----></span></span></a><!---->, featured 100+ teams, with only 30 making it past the first elimination round. Competing among such brilliant minds and earning this award has been an incredible journey!<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->Our project, IndoTrade, is an AI-powered stock analysis and trading platform that leverages real-time financial data and machine learning insights to assist users in making informed investment decisions. By integrating stock and crypto analysis with AI-driven recommendations, Monte Carlo simulations, and personalised features, IndoTrade enhances trading strategies and market understanding. üìàü§ñ<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->A massive shoutout to my fantastic teammates<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAESIoH0BG8NkvDwb_nOko5V02NZi9SSGhD4" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/shlokbam/" id="ember599" class="ember-view"><!---->Shlok Bam<!----></a></span></a><!---->,<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAD9o18UBTQSoXGp1VlTG5JNrV4PGlf1xSyk" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/aditya-bhattacharya-software-developer/" id="ember600" class="ember-view"><!---->Aditya Bhattacharya<!----></a></span></a><!---->, and<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAEZNGhkBpGUbSiWd-LFRGumrkHrwsup67uE" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/akshat-patil-909bb828a/" id="ember601" class="ember-view"><!---->Akshat Patil<!----></a></span></a><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>for their dedication and collaboration.         <span aria-hidden="true"><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>I am passionate about technology and innovation, currently working as a co-founder and principal developer at Gigayouth Continuum. I‚Äôm always eager to learn, which has led me to explore emerging technologies like Amazon Textract for document processing and Three.js for 3D model integration.<!----><br><br><!---->Beyond my academic and technical interests, I‚Äôve represented VIT in several cricket competitions, winning multiple titles and earning the ‚ÄúMan of the Match‚Äù award in a few matches. If you‚Äôre interested in collaborating on innovative projects or want to discuss tech trends, feel free to connect!<!----><br></span><span class="visually-hidden"><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>I am passionate about technology and innovation, currently working as a co-founder and principal developer at Gigayouth Continuum. With extensive experience in full-stack development using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js), I also have proficiency in Python, C, and Java. I have a strong foundation in front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Bootstrap, alongside back-end expertise in Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. I also work with AWS, Docker, and Git for cloud computing and version control.

Currently pursuing my studies in the IT department at Vishwakarma Institute of Technology, Pune, my recent projects include CounsellorNavigator, a personalized college recommendation system using data analytics and machine learning, and AR Wardrobe, a Smart India Hackathon project aimed at revolutionizing retail experiences through virtual try-ons and personalized fashion insights using AR, machine learning, and 3D modeling.

I recently had the opportunity to present a research paper titled ‚ÄúAccelerating Results With No Copy-Paste Hassle‚Äù at the 1st International Conference on Applied Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. I‚Äôm always eager to learn, which has led me to explore emerging technologies like Amazon Textract for document processing and Three.js for 3D model integration.

Beyond my academic and technical interests, I‚Äôve represented VIT in several cricket competitions, winning multiple titles and earning the ‚ÄúMan of the Match‚Äù award in a few matches. I also secured a cash prize in a competition at PCCoER, adding to my diverse achievements. My experiences in competitive sports have strengthened my teamwork, discipline, and perseverance, which I apply to both my personal and professional life.

I firmly believe in the power of proactive action and innovation. My guiding mantra, ‚ÄúThe best way to predict the future is to invent it,‚Äù reflects my commitment to shaping a future full of possibilities and opportunities.

Outside of my academic and professional pursuits, I‚Äôm a skilled athlete and have represented my state in multiple sports, with cricket being my primary focus. My dedication to sports demonstrates my disciplined approach to life and my ability to excel both individually and in team settings.

I‚Äôm also actively involved in leadership and volunteering roles with IEEE and other extracurricular initiatives, always looking to inspire and empower students through technical sessions. If you‚Äôre interested in collaborating on innovative projects or want to discuss tech trends, feel free to connect!<span class="white-space-pre"> </span></span>

          tvm-parent-container">
<!---->        <span dir="ltr"><!---->From a Backbencher to a Speaker ‚Äì A Journey I Never Imagined! üé§üöÄ<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->If you had told me a year ago that I‚Äôd be standing in front of my peers, conducting an expert hands-on session on MongoDB, I probably wouldn‚Äôt have believed you. Being a backbencher, I always thought of myself as someone who learned best by observing. But this experience made me realise that growth happens when you step out of your comfort zone.<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->Recently, I had the privilege of leading a session for Second-Year IT students at VIT Pune, sharing insights on NoSQL databases, schema design, and real-world applications of MongoDB. Teaching my own batchmates, people of my age, was something I never imagined myself doing‚Äîand yet, here I was, guiding them through hands-on learning!<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->üîπ Key Takeaways from this Experience:<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Teaching is the best way to learn ‚Äì Breaking down complex topics made me understand them even better.<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Leadership &amp; communication matter ‚Äì It‚Äôs not just about what you know, but how well you can share it.<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Every step counts ‚Äì From being hesitant to speak up in class to leading a technical session, this journey has been surreal.<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->A huge thanks to<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAABqKuJ8B0y79m0n9oFrH7KPqnhRzg7enWS4" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/amruta-amune-113168105/" id="ember573" class="ember-view"><!---->Amruta Amune<!----></a></span></a><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>ma‚Äôam and<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAEI2rj8BS-U8bElA_J8tOGsWUS03QiVK8Ek" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/pankaj-kunekar-313046270/" id="ember574" class="ember-view"><!---->PANKAJ KUNEKAR<!----></a></span></a><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>sir for believing in me and providing this opportunity. Your support means a lot!<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->This experience has only fueled my passion for tech, mentorship, and continuous learning. Looking forward to more such opportunities and collaborations! If you‚Äôre into databases, full-stack development, or Web3, let‚Äôs connect! üí°<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " tabindex="0" <!---->        <span dir="ltr"><!---->üèÜ Excited to Announce Our Achievement at the IndoVateAI Sprint 2025 Hackathon! üéâ<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->Thrilled to share that our team was recognised with the Best Outstanding Award at the IndoVateAI Sprint 2025 Hackathon! This 18-hour hackathon, sponsored by IndoAI Technologies and organized by the<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/ieee-cis-ccew-student-branch/" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><span><!---->IEEE CIS CCEW Student Branch<!----></span></span></a><!---->, featured 100+ teams, with only 30 making it past the first elimination round. Competing among such brilliant minds and earning this award has been an incredible journey!<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->Our project, IndoTrade, is an AI-powered stock analysis and trading platform that leverages real-time financial data and machine learning insights to assist users in making informed investment decisions. By integrating stock and crypto analysis with AI-driven recommendations, Monte Carlo simulations, and personalised features, IndoTrade enhances trading strategies and market understanding. üìàü§ñ<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->A massive shoutout to my fantastic teammates<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAESIoH0BG8NkvDwb_nOko5V02NZi9SSGhD4" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/shlokbam/" id="ember599" class="ember-view"><!---->Shlok Bam<!----></a></span></a><!---->,<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAD9o18UBTQSoXGp1VlTG5JNrV4PGlf1xSyk" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/aditya-bhattacharya-software-developer/" id="ember600" class="ember-view"><!---->Aditya Bhattacharya<!----></a></span></a><!---->, and<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAEZNGhkBpGUbSiWd-LFRGumrkHrwsup67uE" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/akshat-patil-909bb828a/" id="ember601" class="ember-view"><!---->Akshat Patil<!----></a></span></a><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>for their dedication and collaboration.         <span aria-hidden="true"><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>I am passionate about technology and innovation, currently working as a co-founder and principal developer at Gigayouth Continuum. I have a strong foundation in front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Bootstrap, alongside back-end expertise in Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. I also work with AWS, Docker, and Git for cloud computing and version control.<!----><br><br><!---->Currently pursuing my studies in the IT department at Vishwakarma Institute of Technology, Pune, my recent projects include CounsellorNavigator, a personalized college recommendation system using data analytics and machine learning, and AR Wardrobe, a Smart India Hackathon project aimed at revolutionizing retail experiences through virtual try-ons and personalized fashion insights using AR, machine learning, and 3D modeling.<!----><br><br><!---->I recently had the opportunity to present a research paper titled ‚ÄúAccelerating Results With No Copy-Paste Hassle‚Äù at the 1st International Conference on Applied Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. I‚Äôm always eager to learn, which has led me to explore emerging technologies like Amazon Textract for document processing and Three.js for 3D model integration.<!----><br><br><!---->Beyond my academic and technical interests, I‚Äôve represented VIT in several cricket competitions, winning multiple titles and earning the ‚ÄúMan of the Match‚Äù award in a few matches. I also secured a cash prize in a competition at PCCoER, adding to my diverse achievements. My experiences in competitive sports have strengthened my teamwork, discipline, and perseverance, which I apply to both my personal and professional life.<!----><br><br><!---->I firmly believe in the power of proactive action and innovation. My guiding mantra, ‚ÄúThe best way to predict the future is to invent it,‚Äù reflects my commitment to shaping a future full of possibilities and opportunities.<!----><br><br><!---->Outside of my academic and professional pursuits, I‚Äôm a skilled athlete and have represented my state in multiple sports, with cricket being my primary focus. My dedication to sports demonstrates my disciplined approach to life and my ability to excel both individually and in team settings.<!----><br><br><!---->I‚Äôm also actively involved in leadership and volunteering roles with IEEE and other extracurricular initiatives, always looking to inspire and empower students through technical sessions. If you‚Äôre interested in collaborating on innovative projects or want to discuss tech trends, feel free to connect!<!----><br></span><span class="visually-hidden"><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>I am passionate about technology and innovation, currently working as a co-founder and principal developer at Gigayouth Continuum. With extensive experience in full-stack development using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js), I also have proficiency in Python, C, and Java. I have a strong foundation in front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Bootstrap, alongside back-end expertise in Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. I also work with AWS, Docker, and Git for cloud computing and version control.

Currently pursuing my studies in the IT department at Vishwakarma Institute of Technology, Pune, my recent projects include CounsellorNavigator, a personalized college recommendation system using data analytics and machine learning, and AR Wardrobe, a Smart India Hackathon project aimed at revolutionizing retail experiences through virtual try-ons and personalized fashion insights using AR, machine learning, and 3D modeling.

I recently had the opportunity to present a research paper titled ‚ÄúAccelerating Results With No Copy-Paste Hassle‚Äù at the 1st International Conference on Applied Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. I‚Äôm always eager to learn, which has led me to explore emerging technologies like Amazon Textract for document processing and Three.js for 3D model integration.

Beyond my academic and technical interests, I‚Äôve represented VIT in several cricket competitions, winning multiple titles and earning the ‚ÄúMan of the Match‚Äù award in a few matches. I also secured a cash prize in a competition at PCCoER, adding to my diverse achievements. My experiences in competitive sports have strengthened my teamwork, discipline, and perseverance, which I apply to both my personal and professional life.

I firmly believe in the power of proactive action and innovation. My guiding mantra, ‚ÄúThe best way to predict the future is to invent it,‚Äù reflects my commitment to shaping a future full of possibilities and opportunities.

Outside of my academic and professional pursuits, I‚Äôm a skilled athlete and have represented my state in multiple sports, with cricket being my primary focus. My dedication to sports demonstrates my disciplined approach to life and my ability to excel both individually and in team settings.

I‚Äôm also actively involved in leadership and volunteering roles with IEEE and other extracurricular initiatives, always looking to inspire and empower students through technical sessions. If you‚Äôre interested in collaborating on innovative projects or want to discuss tech trends, feel free to connect!<span class="white-space-pre"> </span></span>

      <span class="break-words
          tvm-parent-container">
<!---->        <span dir="ltr"><!---->From a Backbencher to a Speaker ‚Äì A Journey I Never Imagined! üé§üöÄ<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->If you had told me a year ago that I‚Äôd be standing in front of my peers, conducting an expert hands-on session on MongoDB, I probably wouldn‚Äôt have believed you. Being a backbencher, I always thought of myself as someone who learned best by observing. But this experience made me realise that growth happens when you step out of your comfort zone.<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->Recently, I had the privilege of leading a session for Second-Year IT students at VIT Pune, sharing insights on NoSQL databases, schema design, and real-world applications of MongoDB. Teaching my own batchmates, people of my age, was something I never imagined myself doing‚Äîand yet, here I was, guiding them through hands-on learning!<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->üîπ Key Takeaways from this Experience:<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Teaching is the best way to learn ‚Äì Breaking down complex topics made me understand them even better.<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Leadership &amp; communication matter ‚Äì It‚Äôs not just about what you know, but how well you can share it.<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Every step counts ‚Äì From being hesitant to speak up in class to leading a technical session, this journey has been surreal.<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->A huge thanks to<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAABqKuJ8B0y79m0n9oFrH7KPqnhRzg7enWS4" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/amruta-amune-113168105/" id="ember567" class="ember-view"><!---->Amruta Amune<!----></a></span></a><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>ma‚Äôam and<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAEI2rj8BS-U8bElA_J8tOGsWUS03QiVK8Ek" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/pankaj-kunekar-313046270/" id="ember568" class="ember-view"><!---->PANKAJ KUNEKAR<!----></a></span></a><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>sir for believing in me and providing this opportunity. Your support means a lot!<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->This experience has only fueled my passion for tech, mentorship, and continuous learning. Looking forward to more such opportunities and collaborations! If you‚Äôre into databases, full-stack development, or Web3, let‚Äôs connect! üí°<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " tabindex="0" <!---->        <span dir="ltr"><!---->üèÜ Excited to Announce Our Achievement at the IndoVateAI Sprint 2025 Hackathon! üéâ<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->Thrilled to share that our team was recognised with the Best Outstanding Award at the IndoVateAI Sprint 2025 Hackathon! This 18-hour hackathon, sponsored by IndoAI Technologies and organized by the<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/ieee-cis-ccew-student-branch/" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><span><!---->IEEE CIS CCEW Student Branch<!----></span></span></a><!---->, featured 100+ teams, with only 30 making it past the first elimination round. Competing among such brilliant minds and earning this award has been an incredible journey!<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->Our project, IndoTrade, is an AI-powered stock analysis and trading platform that leverages real-time financial data and machine learning insights to assist users in making informed investment decisions. By integrating stock and crypto analysis with AI-driven recommendations, Monte Carlo simulations, and personalised features, IndoTrade enhances trading strategies and market understanding. üìàü§ñ<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->A massive shoutout to my fantastic teammates<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAESIoH0BG8NkvDwb_nOko5V02NZi9SSGhD4" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/shlokbam/" id="ember593" class="ember-view"><!---->Shlok Bam<!----></a></span></a><!---->,<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAD9o18UBTQSoXGp1VlTG5JNrV4PGlf1xSyk" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/aditya-bhattacharya-software-developer/" id="ember594" class="ember-view"><!---->Aditya Bhattacharya<!----></a></span></a><!---->, and<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAEZNGhkBpGUbSiWd-LFRGumrkHrwsup67uE" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/akshat-patil-909bb828a/" id="ember595" class="ember-view"><!---->Akshat Patil<!----></a></span></a><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>for their dedication and collaboration.         <span aria-hidden="true"><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>I am passionate about technology and innovation, currently working as a co-founder and principal developer at Gigayouth Continuum. I have a strong foundation in front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Bootstrap, alongside back-end expertise in Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. I also work with AWS, Docker, and Git for cloud computing and version control.<!----><br><br><!---->Currently pursuing my studies in the IT department at Vishwakarma Institute of Technology, Pune, my recent projects include CounsellorNavigator, a personalized college recommendation system using data analytics and machine learning, and AR Wardrobe, a Smart India Hackathon project aimed at revolutionizing retail experiences through virtual try-ons and personalized fashion insights using AR, machine learning, and 3D modeling.<!----><br><br><!---->I recently had the opportunity to present a research paper titled ‚ÄúAccelerating Results With No Copy-Paste Hassle‚Äù at the 1st International Conference on Applied Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. I‚Äôm always eager to learn, which has led me to explore emerging technologies like Amazon Textract for document processing and Three.js for 3D model integration.<!----><br><br><!---->Beyond my academic and technical interests, I‚Äôve represented VIT in several cricket competitions, winning multiple titles and earning the ‚ÄúMan of the Match‚Äù award in a few matches. I also secured a cash prize in a competition at PCCoER, adding to my diverse achievements. My experiences in competitive sports have strengthened my teamwork, discipline, and perseverance, which I apply to both my personal and professional life.<!----><br><br><!---->I firmly believe in the power of proactive action and innovation. My guiding mantra, ‚ÄúThe best way to predict the future is to invent it,‚Äù reflects my commitment to shaping a future full of possibilities and opportunities.<!----><br><br><!---->Outside of my academic and professional pursuits, I‚Äôm a skilled athlete and have represented my state in multiple sports, with cricket being my primary focus. My dedication to sports demonstrates my disciplined approach to life and my ability to excel both individually and in team settings.<!----><br><br><!---->I‚Äôm also actively involved in leadership and volunteering roles with IEEE and other extracurricular initiatives, always looking to inspire and empower students through technical sessions. If you‚Äôre interested in collaborating on innovative projects or want to discuss tech trends, feel free to connect!<!----><br></span><span class="visually-hidden"><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>I am passionate about technology and innovation, currently working as a co-founder and principal developer at Gigayouth Continuum. With extensive experience in full-stack development using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js), I also have proficiency in Python, C, and Java. I have a strong foundation in front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Bootstrap, alongside back-end expertise in Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. I also work with AWS, Docker, and Git for cloud computing and version control.

Currently pursuing my studies in the IT department at Vishwakarma Institute of Technology, Pune, my recent projects include CounsellorNavigator, a personalized college recommendation system using data analytics and machine learning, and AR Wardrobe, a Smart India Hackathon project aimed at revolutionizing retail experiences through virtual try-ons and personalized fashion insights using AR, machine learning, and 3D modeling.

I recently had the opportunity to present a research paper titled ‚ÄúAccelerating Results With No Copy-Paste Hassle‚Äù at the 1st International Conference on Applied Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. I‚Äôm always eager to learn, which has led me to explore emerging technologies like Amazon Textract for document processing and Three.js for 3D model integration.

Beyond my academic and technical interests, I‚Äôve represented VIT in several cricket competitions, winning multiple titles and earning the ‚ÄúMan of the Match‚Äù award in a few matches. I also secured a cash prize in a competition at PCCoER, adding to my diverse achievements. My experiences in competitive sports have strengthened my teamwork, discipline, and perseverance, which I apply to both my personal and professional life.

I firmly believe in the power of proactive action and innovation. My guiding mantra, ‚ÄúThe best way to predict the future is to invent it,‚Äù reflects my commitment to shaping a future full of possibilities and opportunities.

Outside of my academic and professional pursuits, I‚Äôm a skilled athlete and have represented my state in multiple sports, with cricket being my primary focus. My dedication to sports demonstrates my disciplined approach to life and my ability to excel both individually and in team settings.

I‚Äôm also actively involved in leadership and volunteering roles with IEEE and other extracurricular initiatives, always looking to inspire and empower students through technical sessions. If you‚Äôre interested in collaborating on innovative projects or want to discuss tech trends, feel free to connect!<span class="white-space-pre"> </span></span>

          tvm-parent-container">
<!---->        <span dir="ltr"><!---->From a Backbencher to a Speaker ‚Äì A Journey I Never Imagined! üé§üöÄ<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->If you had told me a year ago that I‚Äôd be standing in front of my peers, conducting an expert hands-on session on MongoDB, I probably wouldn‚Äôt have believed you. Being a backbencher, I always thought of myself as someone who learned best by observing. But this experience made me realise that growth happens when you step out of your comfort zone.<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->Recently, I had the privilege of leading a session for Second-Year IT students at VIT Pune, sharing insights on NoSQL databases, schema design, and real-world applications of MongoDB. Teaching my own batchmates, people of my age, was something I never imagined myself doing‚Äîand yet, here I was, guiding them through hands-on learning!<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->üîπ Key Takeaways from this Experience:<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Teaching is the best way to learn ‚Äì Breaking down complex topics made me understand them even better.<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Leadership &amp; communication matter ‚Äì It‚Äôs not just about what you know, but how well you can share it.<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Every step counts ‚Äì From being hesitant to speak up in class to leading a technical session, this journey has been surreal.<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->A huge thanks to<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAABqKuJ8B0y79m0n9oFrH7KPqnhRzg7enWS4" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/amruta-amune-113168105/" id="ember567" class="ember-view"><!---->Amruta Amune<!----></a></span></a><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>ma‚Äôam and<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAEI2rj8BS-U8bElA_J8tOGsWUS03QiVK8Ek" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/pankaj-kunekar-313046270/" id="ember568" class="ember-view"><!---->PANKAJ KUNEKAR<!----></a></span></a><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>sir for believing in me and providing this opportunity. Your support means a lot!<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->This experience has only fueled my passion for tech, mentorship, and continuous learning. Looking forward to more such opportunities and collaborations! If you‚Äôre into databases, full-stack development, or Web3, let‚Äôs connect! üí°<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " tabindex="0" <!---->        <span dir="ltr"><!---->üèÜ Excited to Announce Our Achievement at the IndoVateAI Sprint 2025 Hackathon! üéâ<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->Thrilled to share that our team was recognised with the Best Outstanding Award at the IndoVateAI Sprint 2025 Hackathon! This 18-hour hackathon, sponsored by IndoAI Technologies and organized by the<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/ieee-cis-ccew-student-branch/" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><span><!---->IEEE CIS CCEW Student Branch<!----></span></span></a><!---->, featured 100+ teams, with only 30 making it past the first elimination round. Competing among such brilliant minds and earning this award has been an incredible journey!<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->Our project, IndoTrade, is an AI-powered stock analysis and trading platform that leverages real-time financial data and machine learning insights to assist users in making informed investment decisions. By integrating stock and crypto analysis with AI-driven recommendations, Monte Carlo simulations, and personalised features, IndoTrade enhances trading strategies and market understanding. üìàü§ñ<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->A massive shoutout to my fantastic teammates<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAESIoH0BG8NkvDwb_nOko5V02NZi9SSGhD4" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/shlokbam/" id="ember593" class="ember-view"><!---->Shlok Bam<!----></a></span></a><!---->,<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAD9o18UBTQSoXGp1VlTG5JNrV4PGlf1xSyk" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/aditya-bhattacharya-software-developer/" id="ember594" class="ember-view"><!---->Aditya Bhattacharya<!----></a></span></a><!---->, and<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAEZNGhkBpGUbSiWd-LFRGumrkHrwsup67uE" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/akshat-patil-909bb828a/" id="ember595" class="ember-view"><!---->Akshat Patil<!----></a></span></a><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>for their dedication and collaboration.
