          display-flex full-width" data-generated-suggestion-target="urn:li:fsu_profileActionDelegate:183327903">
        
          
      <div class="nuJvBmiEZTsrEOJOARGoNuFyvOIQWdidaKvKxLJo
          full-width t-14 t-normal t-black display-flex align-items-center" dir="ltr">
        
    <div class="OfdwCZjjxgCyuULGgRIBDhAIErLtHJEGSGSlD
        inline-show-more-text--is-collapsed
        inline-show-more-text--is-collapsed-with-line-clamp
        
        
        
         full-width" style="-webkit-line-clamp:4;" dir="ltr" tabindex="-1">

        <span aria-hidden="true"><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>I am passionate about technology and innovation, currently working as a co-founder and principal developer at Gigayouth Continuum. With extensive experience in full-stack development using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js), I also have proficiency in Python, C, and Java. I have a strong foundation in front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Bootstrap, alongside back-end expertise in Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. I also work with AWS, Docker, and Git for cloud computing and version control.<!----><br><br><!---->Currently pursuing my studies in the IT department at Vishwakarma Institute of Technology, Pune, my recent projects include CounsellorNavigator, a personalized college recommendation system using data analytics and machine learning, and AR Wardrobe, a Smart India Hackathon project aimed at revolutionizing retail experiences through virtual try-ons and personalized fashion insights using AR, machine learning, and 3D modeling.<!----><br><br><!---->I recently had the opportunity to present a research paper titled ‚ÄúAccelerating Results With No Copy-Paste Hassle‚Äù at the 1st International Conference on Applied Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. I‚Äôm always eager to learn, which has led me to explore emerging technologies like Amazon Textract for document processing and Three.js for 3D model integration.<!----><br><br><!---->Beyond my academic and technical interests, I‚Äôve represented VIT in several cricket competitions, winning multiple titles and earning the ‚ÄúMan of the Match‚Äù award in a few matches. I also secured a cash prize in a competition at PCCoER, adding to my diverse achievements. My experiences in competitive sports have strengthened my teamwork, discipline, and perseverance, which I apply to both my personal and professional life.<!----><br><br><!---->I firmly believe in the power of proactive action and innovation. My guiding mantra, ‚ÄúThe best way to predict the future is to invent it,‚Äù reflects my commitment to shaping a future full of possibilities and opportunities.<!----><br><br><!---->Outside of my academic and professional pursuits, I‚Äôm a skilled athlete and have represented my state in multiple sports, with cricket being my primary focus. My dedication to sports demonstrates my disciplined approach to life and my ability to excel both individually and in team settings.<!----><br><br><!---->I‚Äôm also actively involved in leadership and volunteering roles with IEEE and other extracurricular initiatives, always looking to inspire and empower students through technical sessions. If you‚Äôre interested in collaborating on innovative projects or want to discuss tech trends, feel free to connect!<!----><br></span><span class="visually-hidden"><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>I am passionate about technology and innovation, currently working as a co-founder and principal developer at Gigayouth Continuum. With extensive experience in full-stack development using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js), I also have proficiency in Python, C, and Java. I have a strong foundation in front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Bootstrap, alongside back-end expertise in Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. I also work with AWS, Docker, and Git for cloud computing and version control.

Currently pursuing my studies in the IT department at Vishwakarma Institute of Technology, Pune, my recent projects include CounsellorNavigator, a personalized college recommendation system using data analytics and machine learning, and AR Wardrobe, a Smart India Hackathon project aimed at revolutionizing retail experiences through virtual try-ons and personalized fashion insights using AR, machine learning, and 3D modeling.

I recently had the opportunity to present a research paper titled ‚ÄúAccelerating Results With No Copy-Paste Hassle‚Äù at the 1st International Conference on Applied Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. I‚Äôm always eager to learn, which has led me to explore emerging technologies like Amazon Textract for document processing and Three.js for 3D model integration.

Beyond my academic and technical interests, I‚Äôve represented VIT in several cricket competitions, winning multiple titles and earning the ‚ÄúMan of the Match‚Äù award in a few matches. I also secured a cash prize in a competition at PCCoER, adding to my diverse achievements. My experiences in competitive sports have strengthened my teamwork, discipline, and perseverance, which I apply to both my personal and professional life.

I firmly believe in the power of proactive action and innovation. My guiding mantra, ‚ÄúThe best way to predict the future is to invent it,‚Äù reflects my commitment to shaping a future full of possibilities and opportunities.

Outside of my academic and professional pursuits, I‚Äôm a skilled athlete and have represented my state in multiple sports, with cricket being my primary focus. My dedication to sports demonstrates my disciplined approach to life and my ability to excel both individually and in team settings.

I‚Äôm also actively involved in leadership and volunteering roles with IEEE and other extracurricular initiatives, always looking to inspire and empower students through technical sessions. If you‚Äôre interested in collaborating on innovative projects or want to discuss tech trends, feel free to connect!<span class="white-space-pre"> </span></span>

<!---->
      <span class="break-words
          tvm-parent-container">
<!---->        <span dir="ltr"><!---->From a Backbencher to a Speaker ‚Äì A Journey I Never Imagined! üé§üöÄ<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->If you had told me a year ago that I‚Äôd be standing in front of my peers, conducting an expert hands-on session on MongoDB, I probably wouldn‚Äôt have believed you. Being a backbencher, I always thought of myself as someone who learned best by observing. But this experience made me realise that growth happens when you step out of your comfort zone.<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->Recently, I had the privilege of leading a session for Second-Year IT students at VIT Pune, sharing insights on NoSQL databases, schema design, and real-world applications of MongoDB. Teaching my own batchmates, people of my age, was something I never imagined myself doing‚Äîand yet, here I was, guiding them through hands-on learning!<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->üîπ Key Takeaways from this Experience:<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Teaching is the best way to learn ‚Äì Breaking down complex topics made me understand them even better.<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Leadership &amp; communication matter ‚Äì It‚Äôs not just about what you know, but how well you can share it.<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Every step counts ‚Äì From being hesitant to speak up in class to leading a technical session, this journey has been surreal.<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->A huge thanks to<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAABqKuJ8B0y79m0n9oFrH7KPqnhRzg7enWS4" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/amruta-amune-113168105/" id="ember567" class="ember-view"><!---->Amruta Amune<!----></a></span></a><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>ma‚Äôam and<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAEI2rj8BS-U8bElA_J8tOGsWUS03QiVK8Ek" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/pankaj-kunekar-313046270/" id="ember568" class="ember-view"><!---->PANKAJ KUNEKAR<!----></a></span></a><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>sir for believing in me and providing this opportunity. Your support means a lot!<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->This experience has only fueled my passion for tech, mentorship, and continuous learning. Looking forward to more such opportunities and collaborations! If you‚Äôre into databases, full-stack development, or Web3, let‚Äôs connect! üí°<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " tabindex="0" <!---->        <span dir="ltr"><!---->üèÜ Excited to Announce Our Achievement at the IndoVateAI Sprint 2025 Hackathon! üéâ<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->Thrilled to share that our team was recognised with the Best Outstanding Award at the IndoVateAI Sprint 2025 Hackathon! This 18-hour hackathon, sponsored by IndoAI Technologies and organized by the<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/ieee-cis-ccew-student-branch/" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><span><!---->IEEE CIS CCEW Student Branch<!----></span></span></a><!---->, featured 100+ teams, with only 30 making it past the first elimination round. Competing among such brilliant minds and earning this award has been an incredible journey!<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->Our project, IndoTrade, is an AI-powered stock analysis and trading platform that leverages real-time financial data and machine learning insights to assist users in making informed investment decisions. By integrating stock and crypto analysis with AI-driven recommendations, Monte Carlo simulations, and personalised features, IndoTrade enhances trading strategies and market understanding. üìàü§ñ<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->A massive shoutout to my fantastic teammates<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAESIoH0BG8NkvDwb_nOko5V02NZi9SSGhD4" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/shlokbam/" id="ember593" class="ember-view"><!---->Shlok Bam<!----></a></span></a><!---->,<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAD9o18UBTQSoXGp1VlTG5JNrV4PGlf1xSyk" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/aditya-bhattacharya-software-developer/" id="ember594" class="ember-view"><!---->Aditya Bhattacharya<!----></a></span></a><!---->, and<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAEZNGhkBpGUbSiWd-LFRGumrkHrwsup67uE" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/akshat-patil-909bb828a/" id="ember595" class="ember-view"><!---->Akshat Patil<!----></a></span></a><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>for their dedication and collaboration.         <span aria-hidden="true"><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>I am passionate about technology and innovation, currently working as a co-founder and principal developer at Gigayouth Continuum. I have a strong foundation in front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Bootstrap, alongside back-end expertise in Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. I also work with AWS, Docker, and Git for cloud computing and version control.<!----><br><br><!---->Currently pursuing my studies in the IT department at Vishwakarma Institute of Technology, Pune, my recent projects include CounsellorNavigator, a personalized college recommendation system using data analytics and machine learning, and AR Wardrobe, a Smart India Hackathon project aimed at revolutionizing retail experiences through virtual try-ons and personalized fashion insights using AR, machine learning, and 3D modeling.<!----><br><br><!---->I recently had the opportunity to present a research paper titled ‚ÄúAccelerating Results With No Copy-Paste Hassle‚Äù at the 1st International Conference on Applied Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. I‚Äôm always eager to learn, which has led me to explore emerging technologies like Amazon Textract for document processing and Three.js for 3D model integration.<!----><br><br><!---->Beyond my academic and technical interests, I‚Äôve represented VIT in several cricket competitions, winning multiple titles and earning the ‚ÄúMan of the Match‚Äù award in a few matches. I also secured a cash prize in a competition at PCCoER, adding to my diverse achievements. My experiences in competitive sports have strengthened my teamwork, discipline, and perseverance, which I apply to both my personal and professional life.<!----><br><br><!---->I firmly believe in the power of proactive action and innovation. My dedication to sports demonstrates my disciplined approach to life and my ability to excel both individually and in team settings.<!----><br><br><!---->I‚Äôm also actively involved in leadership and volunteering roles with IEEE and other extracurricular initiatives, always looking to inspire and empower students through technical sessions. If you‚Äôre interested in collaborating on innovative projects or want to discuss tech trends, feel free to connect!<!----><br></span><span class="visually-hidden"><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>I am passionate about technology and innovation, currently working as a co-founder and principal developer at Gigayouth Continuum. With extensive experience in full-stack development using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js), I also have proficiency in Python, C, and Java. I have a strong foundation in front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Bootstrap, alongside back-end expertise in Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. I also work with AWS, Docker, and Git for cloud computing and version control.

Currently pursuing my studies in the IT department at Vishwakarma Institute of Technology, Pune, my recent projects include CounsellorNavigator, a personalized college recommendation system using data analytics and machine learning, and AR Wardrobe, a Smart India Hackathon project aimed at revolutionizing retail experiences through virtual try-ons and personalized fashion insights using AR, machine learning, and 3D modeling.

I recently had the opportunity to present a research paper titled ‚ÄúAccelerating Results With No Copy-Paste Hassle‚Äù at the 1st International Conference on Applied Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. I‚Äôm always eager to learn, which has led me to explore emerging technologies like Amazon Textract for document processing and Three.js for 3D model integration.

Beyond my academic and technical interests, I‚Äôve represented VIT in several cricket competitions, winning multiple titles and earning the ‚ÄúMan of the Match‚Äù award in a few matches. I also secured a cash prize in a competition at PCCoER, adding to my diverse achievements. My experiences in competitive sports have strengthened my teamwork, discipline, and perseverance, which I apply to both my personal and professional life.

I firmly believe in the power of proactive action and innovation. My guiding mantra, ‚ÄúThe best way to predict the future is to invent it,‚Äù reflects my commitment to shaping a future full of possibilities and opportunities.

Outside of my academic and professional pursuits, I‚Äôm a skilled athlete and have represented my state in multiple sports, with cricket being my primary focus. My dedication to sports demonstrates my disciplined approach to life and my ability to excel both individually and in team settings.

I‚Äôm also actively involved in leadership and volunteering roles with IEEE and other extracurricular initiatives, always looking to inspire and empower students through technical sessions. If you‚Äôre interested in collaborating on innovative projects or want to discuss tech trends, feel free to connect!<span class="white-space-pre"> </span></span>

      <span class="break-words
          tvm-parent-container">
<!---->        <span dir="ltr"><!---->From a Backbencher to a Speaker ‚Äì A Journey I Never Imagined! üé§üöÄ<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->If you had told me a year ago that I‚Äôd be standing in front of my peers, conducting an expert hands-on session on MongoDB, I probably wouldn‚Äôt have believed you. Being a backbencher, I always thought of myself as someone who learned best by observing. But this experience made me realise that growth happens when you step out of your comfort zone.<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->Recently, I had the privilege of leading a session for Second-Year IT students at VIT Pune, sharing insights on NoSQL databases, schema design, and real-world applications of MongoDB. Teaching my own batchmates, people of my age, was something I never imagined myself doing‚Äîand yet, here I was, guiding them through hands-on learning!<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->üîπ Key Takeaways from this Experience:<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Teaching is the best way to learn ‚Äì Breaking down complex topics made me understand them even better.<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Leadership &amp; communication matter ‚Äì It‚Äôs not just about what you know, but how well you can share it.<!----><span><br></span><!---->‚úÖ Every step counts ‚Äì From being hesitant to speak up in class to leading a technical session, this journey has been surreal.<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->A huge thanks to<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAABqKuJ8B0y79m0n9oFrH7KPqnhRzg7enWS4" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/amruta-amune-113168105/" id="ember567" class="ember-view"><!---->Amruta Amune<!----></a></span></a><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>ma‚Äôam and<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAEI2rj8BS-U8bElA_J8tOGsWUS03QiVK8Ek" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/pankaj-kunekar-313046270/" id="ember568" class="ember-view"><!---->PANKAJ KUNEKAR<!----></a></span></a><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>sir for believing in me and providing this opportunity. Your support means a lot!<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->This experience has only fueled my passion for tech, mentorship, and continuous learning. Looking forward to more such opportunities and collaborations! If you‚Äôre into databases, full-stack development, or Web3, let‚Äôs connect! üí°<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " tabindex="0" <!---->        <span dir="ltr"><!---->üèÜ Excited to Announce Our Achievement at the IndoVateAI Sprint 2025 Hackathon! üéâ<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->Thrilled to share that our team was recognised with the Best Outstanding Award at the IndoVateAI Sprint 2025 Hackathon! This 18-hour hackathon, sponsored by IndoAI Technologies and organized by the<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/ieee-cis-ccew-student-branch/" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><span><!---->IEEE CIS CCEW Student Branch<!----></span></span></a><!---->, featured 100+ teams, with only 30 making it past the first elimination round. Competing among such brilliant minds and earning this award has been an incredible journey!<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->Our project, IndoTrade, is an AI-powered stock analysis and trading platform that leverages real-time financial data and machine learning insights to assist users in making informed investment decisions. By integrating stock and crypto analysis with AI-driven recommendations, Monte Carlo simulations, and personalised features, IndoTrade enhances trading strategies and market understanding. üìàü§ñ<!----><span><br></span><span><br></span><!---->A massive shoutout to my fantastic teammates<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAESIoH0BG8NkvDwb_nOko5V02NZi9SSGhD4" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/shlokbam/" id="ember593" class="ember-view"><!---->Shlok Bam<!----></a></span></a><!---->,<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAD9o18UBTQSoXGp1VlTG5JNrV4PGlf1xSyk" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/aditya-bhattacharya-software-developer/" id="ember594" class="ember-view"><!---->Aditya Bhattacharya<!----></a></span></a><!---->, and<span class="white-space-pre"> </span><a class="jRmKxIDSOyXycCHUdZZoTLSiiCghyNjGDU " target="_self" tabindex="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAEZNGhkBpGUbSiWd-LFRGumrkHrwsup67uE" data-test-app-aware-link=""><span><a href="/in/akshat-patil-909bb828a/" id="ember595" class="ember-view"><!---->Akshat Patil<!----></a></span></a><span class="white-space-pre"> </span>for their dedication and collaboration.
